mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESERVICE.DBO.NOTIFY_OF_NEW_CASE_DNS (SEQ_ID,CALL_ID, TYPE, JOB_ID) VALUES ( (NEXT VALUE for NOTIFY_OF_NEW_CASE_DNS_SEQ), #{vo.callId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.jobId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into ESERVICE.DBO.DNS_ALLIANCE (SEQ_ID,NOTIFY_SEQ_ID,TYPE,JOB_ID,CASE_ID, IDNO,INSNOM,NAME,BIRDATE,SEX,CON,CONDATE,ADDDATE,STATUS) values ( (NEXT VALUE for DNS_ALLIANCE_SEQ), #{vo.notifySeqId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.jobId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.caseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ESERVICE.DBO.FN_ENBASE64(#{vo.idno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{vo.insnom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ESERVICE.DBO.FN_ENBASE64(#{vo.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), ESERVICE.DBO.FN_ENBASE64(#{vo.birdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{vo.sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.con, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.condate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.adddate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vo.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select top(10) td.SEQ_ID,td.TYPE,td.JOB_ID,td.CASE_ID,td.TRANS_NUM from ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS t,ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_DNS td where t.STATUS = #{status} and t.TRANS_TYPE = 'DNS_ALLIANCE' and td.CODE is null and t.TRANS_NUM = td.TRANS_NUM

select top(10) td.SEQ_ID,td.TYPE,td.JOB_ID,td.CASE_ID,td.TRANS_NUM,edp.POLICY_NO,td.NAME ,td.CON,td.CONDATE,td.ADDDATE from ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS t inner join ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_DNS td on t.TRANS_TYPE = 'DNS_ALLIANCE' inner join ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_POLICY edp on edp.TRANS_NUM=td.TRANS_NUM where td.CODE is null and t.TRANS_NUM = td.TRANS_NUM and edp.POLICY_NO is not null and td.DETAIL_MESSAGE is null and td.FSZ1_PI_ST='55' and t.STATUS = #{status}
mapper.update: update ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_DNS set SEND_ALLIANCE = #{vo.sendAlliance}, CODE = #{vo.code}, MSG = #{vo.msg}, UPDATE_CODE_DATE = getdate() where SEQ_ID = #{vo.seqId}
mapper.select:
select top(10)
from ESERVICE.DBO.DNS_ALLIANCE where STATUS = '0' and TYPE='InsuranceId' and JOB_ID is not null and CASE_ID is not null
select count(*) from ESERVICE.DBO.DNS_ALLIANCE where TYPE = 'InsuranceId' and CASE_ID = #{caseId};

select top(10) td.SEQ_ID,td.TYPE,td.JOB_ID,td.CASE_ID,td.TRANS_NUM,edp.POLICY_NO,td.NAME ,td.CON,td.CONDATE,td.ADDDATE,td.IDNO from ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS t inner join ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_DNS td on t.TRANS_TYPE = 'DNS_ALLIANCE' inner join ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_POLICY edp on edp.TRANS_NUM=td.TRANS_NUM where td.CODE is null and t.TRANS_NUM = td.TRANS_NUM and edp.POLICY_NO is not null and td.DETAIL_MESSAGE is null and td.FSZ1_PI_ST is null and t.STATUS = #{status}
mapper.update: update ESERVICE.DBO.DNS_ALLIANCE set STATUS = #{vo.status}, UPDATE_STATUS_DATE = getdate() where SEQ_ID = #{vo.seqId}

update ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_DNS set FSZ1_PI_ST = #{vo.fsz1PiSt}, FSZ1_ID = #{vo.fsz1Id}, TOKEN = #{vo.token} where TRANS_NUM in ( select TRANS_NUM from ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_POLICY WHERE POLICY_NO=#{vo.policyNo} )
